title: cmd/go: vendor submodule support depends on Git 1.8.5, breaks on RHEL 7
body:
The use of git's global -C option breaks on RHEL 7 because that option was introduced in Git 1.8.5 but RHEL 7 runs Git 1.8.3.1. It's fairly easy to do without, so we probably should.

See discussion at https://github.com/linux-on-ibm-z/go/commit/761ac75a948e14fcd8472684effedf75f3fc316e#commitcomment-15819577
